item.description:
The annual Hartford Advocate Black-eyed & Blues presented by Red Hook Longhammer IPA and Bud Light returns to Bushnell Park for its tenth year of sizzling food, ice-cold beer, and hot Blues music! Rain or shine, from 5-11 PM on this Aetna First Thursday in June, thousands of fans will enjoy a healthy dose of Blues music with renowned national and regional artists Ryan Hartt & the Blue Hearts, River City Slim & the Zydeco Hogs, Larry Garner Blues Band, Sarah Borges & the Broken Singles and Jeff Pitchell & Texas Flood.


5 PM-11 PM
Bushnell Park Pavilion
Downtown Hartford, CT

Admission Absolutely Free!!!
Food from Black-Eyed Sally's for sale.

When you RSVP, tell us what time you expect to arrive. We may also want to exchange cell phone numbers, too, to help us fine one another.


Blues offered by some of the Hottest Acts around!
Ryan Hart & the Blue Hearts (5:00-6:00 PM)
River City Slim & the Zydeco Hogs (6:15-7:15 PM)
Larry Garner Blues Band (7:30-8:30 PM)
Sarah Borges & the Broken Singles (8:45-9:45 PM)
Jeff Pitchell & Texas Flood (10:00-11:00 PM)


All Ages - No Coolers - No Food - No Dogs - Line-up subject to change

Factory sealed water bottles allowed.

Brought to you by: The CT Blues Society

Hartford Advocate, Greater Hartford Arts Council, Black-eyed Sallyâ€™s, Red Hook Longhammer IPA and Bud Light, WCCC, 91.7 WHUS-FM, Fox 61-WTIC, CW 20-WTXX
item.name: Black-eyed and Bluesfest 2010
